title: Teemo snowman and flower petal icon
body:
Is there a way to get all the teemo icons ? I am willing to do anything for them ! I am a huge fan of teemo. Riot please be open minded.
Riot please give me a change i need those icon. 

p.s. <3 teemo

replies.body:
Hey there,

The Snow Teemo summoner icon was only available during the Snowdown 2013 event after earning all other available icons.

I can't seem to find any info on a Flower Petal icon, however I assume this was also limited edition.
I don't believe Riot makes these available again and to maintain the limitedness of them does not give them out under normal circumstances.

The best way to confirm/deny whether there's any way for you to obtain either of these icons would be to [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) directly and inquire.
Thank you so much for the help ~~!!
